comment: you are graded on 2 group projects which are graded pretty harshly and weekly in class quizzes. the quizzes are so easy and simple but this professors lectures put me to sleep. its a very slow paced class, i would recommend take him because he gives you good opportunities to get a good grade

Professor Iason is the most caring professor at KSU! He has in-class assignments, out of class assignments, and a final project. His assignments work around your schedule and are seriously so EASY! The lectures are so interesting, it will make you want to come to class. Attendance is not mandatory and if you miss, he is so understanding. Take him!
